minimum_players_required: A minimum of {quantity} players is required to start the game

missions.alien_unknown_planet: An alien from an unknown planet
missions.cute_animal_strange: A cute monster with a strange flaw
missions.floating_city_sky: A floating city in the sky
missions.giant_mushroom_civilisation: A giant mushroom with a hidden civilisation underneath
missions.hidden_temple: A hidden temple filled with mysteries
missions.king_queen_fantasy: A king or queen in a fantasy universe
missions.machine_flying_space: A machine for flying into space
missions.machine_turns_food: A machine that turns anything into food
missions.mad_scientist: A mad scientist and his invention
missions.secret_weapon: A secret weapon to conquer the world
missions.superhero_never_seen: A superhero with a never-before-seen power
missions.terrifying_monster_abyss: A terrifying monster from the abyss
missions.warrior_parallel: A warrior from a parallel world

chaos.name: Chaos
chaos.description: Draw as a team to achieve secret objectives, but beware: a saboteur is hiding among you!

total_chaos.name: Total Chaos
total_chaos.description: Take turns adding to a collective drawing, building on the previous element.

undercover.name: Undercover
undercover.description: Each player is given a word to draw, but one player will have a different word. Can you spot it?

objectives.building_look_like_face: Make a building look like a face
objectives.character_ridiculous_accessory: Give the character a ridiculous accessory
objectives.creature_look_famous_people: Make the creature look like a famous person, but subtly
objectives.detail_human_face: Add a detail that looks like a human face
objectives.element_out_of_context: Incorporate an element that is completely out of context
objectives.element_pop_culture: Add an element of pop culture without it being too obvious
objectives.hide_animal_background: Hide an animal somewhere in the background
objectives.hide_object_out_context: Hide an object that is completely out of context (example: a stop sign in the jungle)
objectives.look_sad: Make them look sad, no matter their role
objectives.machine_expressive_face: Give the machine an expressive face
objectives.machine_look_like_animal: Make the machine look like an animal without it being obvious
objectives.many_wheels: Add as many wheels as possible
objectives.modern_anachronistic_element: Incorporate a modern anachronistic element (example: a satellite dish on a tree)
objectives.red_button: Add a very suspicious big red button
objectives.ridiculously_small_huge_door: Add a ridiculously small or huge door
objectives.something_look_sad_scared: Make something look sad or scared
objectives.strange_statue: Incorporate a strange statue that doesn't seem to belong
objectives.tatoo_secret_symbol_body: Incorporate a secret tattoo or symbol on their body
objectives.ten_eyes: Add at least 10 eyes to the drawing
objectives.tiny_creature_background: Add a tiny creature hidden in the background
objectives.unnecessary_element: Incorporate an unnecessary element (example: a hat, a moustache)
objectives.whole_thing_tilts_dangerously: Make the whole thing tilt dangerously

voting.buildings_cities: Does the building or city seem to stand up?
voting.building_look_like_face: Does it look like a face?
voting.character_ridiculous_accessory: Does it have a ridiculous accessory?
voting.characters_heroes: Does the character or hero seem credible?
voting.creature_look_famous_people: Does it look like a famous person?
voting.creatures_monsters: Does the creature or monster seem credible?
voting.detail_human_face: Is there a detail that resembles a human face?
voting.element_out_of_context: Is there an element that is completely out of context?
voting.element_pop_culture: Is there an element of pop culture?
voting.excessively_long_tail: Is there an excessively long tail?
voting.hide_animal_background: Is there an animal hidden in the background?
voting.hide_object_out_context: Is there a completely out-of-context object hidden?
voting.machine_expressive_face: Does the machine have an expressive face?
voting.machine_look_like_animal: Does the machine look like an animal?
voting.machines_inventions: Does the machine or invention seem to work?
voting.modern_anachronistic_element: Is there a modern anachronistic element?
voting.nature_landscapes: Does the nature or landscape seem real?
voting.overly_large_moustache: Is there an excessively large moustache?
voting.red_button: Is there a suspicious big red button?
voting.ridiculously_small_huge_door: Is there a ridiculously small or huge door?
voting.something_look_sad_scared: Is there an element that looks sad or scared?
voting.strange_statue: Is there a strange statue that doesn't seem to belong?
voting.tatoo_secret_symbol_body: Is there a tattoo or secret symbol on the body?
voting.ten_eyes: Are there at least 10 eyes in the drawing?
voting.tiny_creature_background: Is there a tiny creature hidden in the background?
voting.whole_thing_tilts_dangerously: Does the whole thing tilt dangerously?
